hooks.command: tuist test --platform ios --skip-ui-tests --no-open 2>/dev/null || echo 'Unit tests need attention'
if [[ "$TOOL_INPUT" == *.swift ]]; then tuist generate --no-open 2>/dev/null || true; fi
if git diff --name-only | grep -q '\.swift$'; then tuist build --platform ios --no-open 2>/dev/null || echo 'Build needs attention'; fi

grep -E '(password\s*=|API_KEY\s*=|secret\s*=|token\s*=)' <<< "$TOOL_INPUT" && { echo 'Error: Hardcoded credentials detected! Please use environment variables or secure storage instead.' >&2; exit 2; } || true
if [[ "$TOOL_INPUT" =~ (.env|Secrets.plist|Info.plist) ]]; then echo 'Warning: Modifying sensitive file. Please review carefully.' >&2; fi
if [[ "$TOOL_INPUT" =~ (git\s+commit) ]]; then tuist test --platform ios --no-open || { echo 'Error: All tests must pass before committing!' >&2; exit 2; }; fi
tuist test --platform ios --no-open 2>/dev/null && echo 'âœ… All tests passing!' || echo 'âš ï¸ Some tests need attention'
echo 'ðŸ“Š Test Coverage Report:' && swift test --enable-code-coverage 2>/dev/null | grep -A5 'Test Suite' || true
echo 'ðŸ“ Session Summary: Run "git status" to review changes. Use "git diff" to see modifications.'
echo 'ðŸ¥ VetNet session started. Loading project environment...' && tuist generate --no-open && echo 'âœ… Project ready for TDD development!'
echo 'ðŸ”„ Resuming VetNet session...' && git status --short && echo '---' && git log --oneline -5
if [[ "$USER_PROMPT" =~ (delete|remove|drop|destroy) ]]; then echo 'âš ï¸ Destructive operation detected. Please review carefully.' >&2; fi
echo 'Subagent task completed. Running validation...' && swiftlint --quiet 2>/dev/null || true
echo 'Auto-compacting: Saving important context...' && git diff > /tmp/vetnet-uncommitted-changes.diff 2>/dev/null || true
echo 'Manual compact: Backing up session state...' && git status > /tmp/vetnet-session-state.txt 2>/dev/null || true
